DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , control pilot study compare antidepressant fluoxetine second generation antipsychotic aripiprazole approximately 10 subject age 12-25 risk develop psychosis . Our primary hypothesis compare aripiprazole , fluoxetine well tolerate lead great improvement symptom end 6 month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Antidepressants Antipsychotics Preventing Psychosis
DOC.criteria: 1225 year age ( inclusive ) Able understand speak English Have least one subthreshold positive psychotic symptom moderate , moderately severe , severe Lifetime diagnosis Axis I psychotic disorder : schizophreniform disorder ; schizophrenia ; schizoaffective disorder ; bipolar disorder ; major depression psychotic feature Current psychosis Current diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder , single episode recurrent , severe without psychotic feature Lifetime diagnosis substance abuse dependence ( exclude nicotine ) Current stimulant treatment Any significant medical condition contraindicate treatment either aripiprazole fluoxetine , include history neurological , neuroendocrine medical condition know affect brain Estimated intelligence quotient < 70
